title: Attach object to another existing object association
It’s possible to attach an object to an existing object as if there was a new property. This is called
association
i
and allows one to extend existing objects. It can be used to provide storage when adding a property via a class extension or otherwise add additional information to an existing object.

inline_content.Text: It’s possible to attach an object to an existing object as if there was a new property. This is called
and allows one to extend existing objects. It can be used to provide storage when adding a property via a class extension or otherwise add additional information to an existing object.

title: The associated object is automatically released by the runtime once the target object is deallocated.

inline_content.Text: The associated object is automatically released by the runtime once the target object is deallocated.
